title: Schneider Concerts Chamber Music Series at The New School

title: Greenwich Village Orchestra: ‘Resilience’ Concert
description: Featuring Valerie Coleman’s 'Seven O’Clock Shout', Mozart’s Clarinet Concerto, and Sibelius’ First Symphony.

cost: $15 general, $10 seniors/students with promo code 'theskint' (reg. $30 general, $20 seniors/students)

title: Holiday Under the Stars @ The Shops at Columbus Circle
description: Celebrates 20 years with a new holiday décor installation featuring 300,000 twinkling lights.

title: Morbid Anatomy Krampus Holiday Market
